channel.title: Going down ladders, staircases, caves, doors, levers etc
channel.description: I'm trying to open a door... won't work, when I click = does nothing. Same with staircases and ladders and stuff.

item.title: Going down ladders, staircases, caves, doors, levers etc
item.dc:creator: @erc erc
item.description:
@erc wrote:

It’s not that I don’t know what i’m talking about. -.-
I don’t understand something which is why i’m posting a topic. Obviously you are dumb yourself if you don’t know why people ask questions, post topics or even have a Help/Development forum anyway.

Edit: Your dumber then I thought. Or is spelt or, not ore.

Read full topic

item.title: Going down ladders, staircases, caves, doors, levers etc
item.dc:creator: @erc erc
item.description:
@erc wrote:

Okay, well I’m next to the staircase… and I’ve opened up client.java.

So…

What do you mean by case… and where in client.java?

Read full topic
item.source: Going down ladders, staircases, caves, doors, levers etc

item.title: Going down ladders, staircases, caves, doors, levers etc
item.dc:creator: @Jagex_Ltd Jagex Ltd©
item.description:
@Jagex_Ltd wrote:

case ####: // case ID
teleportToX = ####;// X coord
teleportToY = ####;// Y coord
sendMessage(“What it says here”);//message send to player
setAnimation(###);//playeranim
break;

Read full topic

item.title: Going down ladders, staircases, caves, doors, levers etc
item.dc:creator: @Dan1337 Dan1337
item.description:
@Dan1337 wrote:

You have to set the case in the client.java …

Case [OBJECTID]:
[WHATITDOESHERE];
break;

Read full topic
